page.title: 17FAVOURITE T.V.PROGRAMMES.
page.content: {The A-Team.}This is about 4 people called Hannibal,Face,B.A.and Murdock. They stop people doing wrong things like stores being smashed up so they can't get customers. {The Fall Guy.}This is an action packed series.I like the stunts he does and I like his truck. {Tom and Jerry.}These cartoons are really funny.A cat and a mouse are always chasing each other. {Dodger Bonzo.}It is about some children who live in a home because their parents can't cope with them. They get up to all sorts of tricks. {Shine on Harvey Moon.}This is a comedy programme written about wartime.The main characters are Stanley who is 13 years old,his sister who is about 20 and his mother and father.Stanley is trying to make his sister teach him to dance but so far without success.
